name: Fragile frogs
description:
This is a frog-like tower defense game for the UNWRAP game jam

The theme was fragile

The frogs need to defend their fragile eggs that are in the water.
Once the egg has hatched the frogs can join the fight to protect their brothers and sisters in combat.    

 CHARGE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Place your eggs in the river at the end of each round
If your eggs are pulsing they are ready to hatch.
Hatch your frogs to let them join the fight.

And protect motherfrogger at all costs!!!

You can move the camera with WASD or RIGHT CLICK to drag
Left click to hatch eggs and place towers
